tool_description: A comprehensive API for accessing various features of YouTube Music, including lyrics, trends, albums, artists, songs, users, and playlists.

api_list.name: Get Watch Playlist
api_list.description: Retrieves a watch list of tracks that appear when you press play on a track in YouTube Music.

required_parameters.name: video_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the video for which to get the watch playlist.

api_list.name: Get Lyrics
api_list.description: Returns the lyrics of a specified song or video.

required_parameters.name: browse_id
required_parameters.description: The browse ID of the song or video.

api_list.name: Get Song Related
api_list.description: Fetches related content for a specific song, similar to the 'Related' tab in the watch panel.

required_parameters.name: browse_id
required_parameters.description: The browse ID of the song.

api_list.name: Get Song
api_list.description: Returns metadata and streaming information about a specific song or video.

required_parameters.name: video_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the video for which to get song information.

api_list.name: Get User Playlists
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of playlists for a specified user. Call this function again with the returned parameters to get the full list.

required_parameters.name: params
required_parameters.description: Parameters for pagination and retrieval of playlists.

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the user whose playlists are to be retrieved.

api_list.name: Get User
api_list.description: Retrieves the page of a specified user, which may include their videos or playlists.

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: The channel ID of the user.

api_list.name: Get Album
api_list.description: Retrieves information and tracks of a specified album.

required_parameters.name: browse_id
required_parameters.description: The browse ID of the album, typically obtained from a search.

api_list.name: Get Artist Albums
api_list.description: Retrieves information about an artist and their top releases, including songs, albums, singles, videos, and related artists.

required_parameters.name: channel_id
required_parameters.description: The channel ID of the artist.

required_parameters.name: params
required_parameters.description: Parameters obtained from the get_artist() function for pagination.

api_list.name: Get Artist
api_list.description: Retrieves information about a specific artist and their top releases.

optional_parameters.name: channel_id
optional_parameters.description: The channel ID of the artist.

api_list.name: Trends
api_list.description: Retrieves the latest charts data from YouTube Music, including top songs, top videos, top artists, and trending videos.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code. Default is ZZ for Global.

api_list.name: Mood Categories
api_list.description: Returns various mood categories available in YouTube Music.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Searches YouTube Music and returns results based on the provided query and category.

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: Language code for the search results.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search term to query YouTube Music.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.
